hero.headline: Shop Social for Best Prices
hero.description: Shop and save online with friends, ${Kip} gets you the lowest prices when you shop together.${br}Use Kip today!

services.tagDescrip: ${Kip} beats traditional web shopping by bringing all types of products into one place.

descrips: Forgot password? Kip lets you shop across multiple stores with 1-login.
Save on shipping and split Amazon Prime fees without sharing passwords.
Create group orders through Slack, Email, and Facebook Messenger.

compare.subHead: Just check out how we compare.

images.bubble: Browse Items or Paste a URL to Add Things to Your Kip Cart
Use Kip to Store the Items you Love in the Cloud
Invite friends to Add to Your Kip Cart, Share Shipping and Other Fees

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtext: Can't find your answer? Contact us at ${mail}

qs.title: How do I use kip?
qs.answer: Start using Kip by clicking New Cart and enter your email address to login${br}Select your favorite store and add items to Kip cart using search or copy - paste URL.${br}Check out the tutorial on How It Works page

qs.title: How do I add other people to my Kip Cart?
qs.answer: Invite friends to Kip by clicking the +Share button on your Kip cart.${br}Copy the entire link and paste to share with anyone or tap the social media icons

qs.title: Is Kip Free?
qs.answer: Kip is 100% free for users. We make money through retailer affiliate fees to keep it free for you!

qs.title: How do I request a vendor/brand on Kip?
qs.answer: Tell us what brands and stores you want  or you can email, tweet or chat us directly!

qs.title: Is Kip available outside USA?
qs.answer: Yes! Learn more about Kip Global Direct and our shopping services into UK and Southeast Asia.${br}${br}If you don’t see your country, drop us a message on email, twitter or chat.

qs.title: I have an idea! How do I request a feature?
qs.answer: Tell us what features you want here or you can email, tweet or chat us directly!

qs.title: Kip is broken, please help!
qs.answer: I’m sorry you’re having trouble. Contact us on email, twitter or chat and we will reply you ASAP. ${br}${br}Please describe the error and attach any screenshots if possible.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.mission: Our vision is a universal shopping experience for groups that leverage their social power to get the best deals across the globe.${br}${br}Kip guarantees our customers the best service experience and speedy responses to your questions

why.head: WHY PENGUINS?
why.description: ${Kip} brings a penguin's perspective to collective purchasing.

reasons.text: Penguins protect each other. Kip keeps your data safe, and doesn’t resell to 3rd parties.
Penguins help each other out, Kip helps you split and share account fees like Amazon Prime with friends.
Penguins use the power of groups to fish, Kip takes away the stress of organizing group orders to get better prices.
